nodes.text: Zoochberry topping was a dessert topping made from zoochberries. Prior to its destruction during the first two years of the Galactic Empire's reign, the eatery Dex's Diner on the planet Coruscant offered a choice of zoochberry topping or Trammistan chocolate on a Neuvian sundae, which was sold for 2.7 credits.
Zoochberry topping was mentioned in Dining at Dex's, a 2009 Hyperspace article written by Gregory Walker.
